required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy Combined Camrelizumab in Patients With Advanced/Metastatic Hepatocellular Carcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Single-arm, Non-randomized Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy Plus Camrelizumab as a Second-line Treatment in Advanced/Metastatic Hepatocellular Carcinoma

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to explore the efficacy and safety of hyperbaric oxygen therapy plus Camrelizumab as a second-line treatment in patients with advanced hepatocellular carcinoma who have failed at least 1 previous treatment.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: A Phase 1b, Open-Label, Single-Arm Study to explore the efficacy and safety of hyperbaric oxygen therapy plus Camrelizumab as a second-line treatment in patients with advanced hepatocellular carcinoma who have failed at least 1 previous treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Objective Response Rate (ORR) per RECIST v1.1
primary_outcome.description: ORR defined as the proportion of subjects who achieved a complete response (disappearance of all target lesions) or a partial response (≥ 30% decrease in the sum of the longest diameters of target lesions) based on RECIST v1.1.

primary_outcome.measure: Progression-free survival based on RECIST v1.1
primary_outcome.time_frame: Time from first treatment to the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 12 months
primary_outcome.description: Progression-free survival defined as the time from the first day of taking study drug to death or disease progression by RECIST v1.1.

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of Response Rate per RECIST v1.1
secondary_outcome.description: time from the date of CR or PR until PD

secondary_outcome.measure: Disease control rate per RECIST v1.1
secondary_outcome.description: Disease control rate (DCR)=CR + PR + stable disease
Duration from the date of initial treatment with hyperbaric oxygen therapy plus Camrelizumab to the date of death due to any cause.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Subjects with one or more adverse events as assessed by CTCAE 5.0
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From screening through 30-35 days after end of treatment, up to 12 months
secondary_outcome.description: Safety and tolerability of hyperbaric oxygen therapy plus Camrelizumab as assessed by the frequency, duration, and severity of adverse events

arm_group.description: Subjects receive Camrelizumab intravenous at the dose 3mg/kg on Day 1 every 3 weeks, and breath pressurized (0.25 MPa) 100% oxygen (O2) indirectly by a head hood or mask for 60 minutes in multiplace chambers at Day 1 of every week.

intervention.description: Camrelizumab is a humanized anti-PD1 IgG4 monoclonal antibody

facility.name: Hepatic Surgery Center, Tongji Hospital, Huazhong University of Science and Technology
